pkgmetadata.longdescription: Structural Bayesian Vector Autoregression Models // Provides a function for running Structural Bayesian Vector Autoregression models with the method developed by Baumeister and Hamilton (2015) doi:10.3982/ECTA12356, Baumeister and Hamilton (2017) doi:10.3386/w24167, and Baumeister and Hamilton (2018) doi:10.1016/j.jmoneco.2018.06.005. Functions for plotting impulse responses, historical decompositions, and posterior distributions of model parameters are also provided.
